document.full_text: somali pirates have freed a greek-owned, cyprus-flagged ship they seized in january after receiving a ransom payment, pirates and a piracy monitoring group said.
document.title: somali pirates release greek-owned ship, ransom paid
lines_and_colors: somali pirates have freed a greek-owned, cyprus-flagged ship they seized in january after receiving a ransom payment, pirates and a piracy monitoring group said.
